document_data.mainbody:
Analyze device was a spell unique to Zakhara, the Land of Fate. This spell was used primarily by mechanicians.
With this spell, a wizard or mechanician was able to discern the workings of a clockwork device crafted by another. Random information was determined, making the mechanisms primary purpose difficult to discern. More functions were determined the longer the caster kept the spell active. The spell would end automatically if all of the functions for a device were discovered.
This spell required a special mechanical device to cast.
